title: Molina Healthcare
description: Molina Healthcare provides managed care services in Florida, primarily serving Medicaid and Medicare beneficiaries including individuals with autism spectrum disorder. Molina's Florida plans offer comprehensive autism coverage through their behavioral health programs, including ABA therapy, speech therapy, occupational therapy, and mental health services. The company focuses on coordinated care for members with complex needs and maintains provider networks experienced in autism treatment. Molina offers care management services to help families navigate autism services and connect with appropriate specialists.
